channel.title: Can't wear custom items after added (667)
channel.description:
hello guys, always after i add custom items to my 667 rsps it says you can't wear this item http://prntscr.com/4dsmjg
help me please :)

item.title: Can't wear custom items after added (667)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

protection-scape:

i duplicated a weareable item

I’d take a look into the code that handles wearing items. See how it’s loading and reading each item. I’d assume it’s reading some form of cache data (since it’s a 667 and all), but there might be a way to hardcode your item in so it’s wieldable.
Sorry I can’t actually be much help, I’ve never messed with a 667. Literally never.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't wear custom items after added (667)

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

protection-scape:

i watched 2 vidds and they just adde it into the cache duplicated an item and use a free spot in cache and just edit

Okay. Did you duplicate a wearable item? Or just any random one. Because it would help if you based it off an already wieldable item.
